typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movieId as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	skipLines: 1,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> movieCSV
movieCSV derive(genres = split(genres,'|')) ~> createHierarchy
createHierarchy sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		movieId,
		title,
		genres
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> writeJson
